quest.name: Spooked
journal: M'gizzoh is itching to go hunting.
objectives: Survey the designated location and slay any broken bhoots that appear.

dialogue.name: MGIZZOH
dialogue.text: Nice nightGood day for hunting isn't it? Especially now that the Garleans have turned tail and fled. Before you couldn't step foot from the Peering Stones without being dragged into a fight between them and the Resistance.

dialogue.name: MGIZZOH
dialogue.text: Now that we're back to our usual haunts, I've run into a bit of trouble. It seems in our absence a horde of bhoots have taken a liking to my favorite place to hunt.

dialogue.name: MGIZZOH
dialogue.text: They're always hiding on the cliff tops just out of range of my arrows, and swooping down when I'm not looking. Would that I had wings to fly up after them.

dialogue.name: MGIZZOH
dialogue.text: Word has it you have a knack for handling seemingly insurmountable problems. It'd mean the world to me if you could scale the cliffs southwest of here and do away with the bhoots.

dialogue.name: MGIZZOH
dialogue.text: You may not see them at first, but if you wait around long enough, they're sure to turn up. Be careful, though. They can be pretty nasty.

dialogue.name: MGIZZOH
dialogue.text: The bhoots are gone? So you did scale the cliffs! That's quite the feat.

dialogue.name: MGIZZOH
dialogue.text: A pity you're not part of our tribe. We could do with more capable hunters like you.

dialogue.name: MGIZZOH
dialogue.text: But what are ghosts doing there to begin with? By all rights they should be busy brooding about a cemetery somewhere.

dialogue.name: MGIZZOH
dialogue.text: Then again, Virdjala has seen more than its fair share of death lately. Hopefully any other spirits still lingering there will soon move on.
